sn33.4:4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn33.4:4.3: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33.4:4.4: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā … pe …
sn33.4:4.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti?
sn33.4:4.6: “Saṅkhāresu kho, vaccha, aññāṇā, saṅkhārasamudaye aññāṇā, saṅkhāranirodhe aññāṇā, saṅkhāranirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇā;
sn33.4:4.8: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā … pe …
sn33.4:4.9: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vāti.
sn33.4:4.10: Ayaṃ kho, vaccha, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yānimāni anekavihitāni diṭṭhigatāni loke uppajjanti—
sn33.4:4.11: sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā … pe …
sn33.4:4.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā”ti.
